title: Absolutely appalled by the shoe's grip on wet surfaces
body: It works well as long as it's dry, as soon as it touches water it feels like you have stepped on a banana. I am throwing the shoes and would recommend anyone to not buy it as it could seriously be hazardous to your health due to the constant balancing act you have to do while walking on a rainy day.

title: 'Nice shoes'
body: 'After 1 year of use I can say shoes are very good if you want regular wearing gym  casual use they are very comfortable if your size matches. Only issue with these is that their sole become flat very fast  within 3 months if you used to walk a lot and when sole gets flat it becomes slippery. It will trouble you on a wet and slippery surface.'

title: 'Decent pair of running shoes.'
body: I've daily driven this pair for the past two years, except in peak summers. The shoes are definitely somewhat tight and had I known this, I'd have gone for a size higher. However they did expand somewhat once I put them through some use and they're now way more comfortable than they were when brand new.  They have held up really well and there are no major tears on the fabric yet. The tread pattern has definitely worn off quite a bit, but it's still there. The stickers on the side however are coming off and will probably fall soon.  Overall a good product and is quite comfortable and definitely durable. However they might be tight for your feet so consider ordering a size higher.
